text: Quảng Bình () is a province in the North Central Coast of Vietnam. The province has the World Heritage Phong Nha-Ke Bang National Park. The province is the place of birth of several famous Vietnamese persons, including general Vo Nguyen Giap, the family of former South Vietnamese president Ngo Dinh Diem, poet Han Mac Tu, and writer Bao Ninh. During the Vietnam War, this province was severely devastated by bombing by U.S. B-52s. == Gallery == Image:Phongnha17.jpg|Phong Nha-Ke Bang Image:Nhat Le River.jpg|Nhật Lệ River Image:Da Nhay Beach.jpg|Da Nhay Beach Image:BangSpa4.jpg|Bang Spa Image:Nhat Le Beach.jpg|Nhat Le Beach Image:Quang Binh Quan.jpg|Quang Binh gate Image:Phongnhakebang2.jpg|Phong Nha-Ke Bang Image:Phongnha21.jpg|Phong Nha-Ke Bang ==References== *
title: Quảng Bình province
